articles.title: HPV Vaccine Could Shifts Rates of Non-Cervical Cancers - The News Motion
articles.description: Jan. 12, 2022 -- A recent headline about dramatic reductions in cervical cancer among young women as a result of the HPV vaccine did not tell the whole story of how vaccination could also have an impact on many other cancer types.&
